item.title: Pearl add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Pearl add a quote by William Shakespeare
Pearl add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Pearl add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J. R. R. Tolkien
item.description: "Three Rings for the Elven-kings under the sky, Seven for the Dwarf-lords in halls of stone, Nine for Mortal Men, doomed to die, One for the Dark Lord on his dark throne In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie. One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them. In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie." -- J. R. R. Tolkien

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Youth can not know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We do not need magic to transform our world. We carry all of the power we need inside ourselves already." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "Lolita, light of my life, fire of my loins. My sin, my soul. Lo-lee-ta: the tip of the tongue taking a trip of three steps down the palate to tap, at three, on the teeth. Lo. Lee. Ta. She was Lo, plain Lo, in the morning, standing four feet ten in one sock. She was Lola in slacks. She was Dolly at school. She was Dolores on the dotted line. But in my arms she was always Lolita. Did she have a precursor? She did, indeed she did. In point of fact, there might have been no Lolita at all had I not loved, one summer, an initial girl-child. In a princedom by the sea. Oh when? About as many years before Lolita was born as my age was that summer. You can always count on a murderer for a fancy prose style. Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, exhibit number one is what the seraphs, the misinformed, simple, noble-winged seraphs, envied. Look at this tangle of thorns." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Stephen R. Lawhead
item.description: "Arthur is no fit king. Uther's bastard, Merlin's pawn, he is lowborn and a fool. He is wanton and petty and cruel. A glutton and a drunkard, he lacks all civilized graces. In short, he is a sullen, ignorant brute. All these things and more men say of Arthur. Let them. When all the words are spoken and the arguements fall exhausted into silence, this single fact remains: we would follow Arthur to the very gates of Hell and beyond if he asked it. And that is the solitary truth. Show me another who can claim such loyalty." -- Stephen R. Lawhead

item.title: Pearl add a quote by David Guterson
item.description: "The strange thing was, he wanted to like everyone. He just couldn't find a way to do it." -- David Guterson

item.title: Pearl add a quote by David Guterson
item.description: "None of those other things makes a difference. Love is the strongest thing in the world, you know. Nothing can touch it. Nothing comes close. If we love each other we're safe from it all. Love is the biggest thing there is." -- David Guterson

item.title: Pearl add a quote by David Guterson
item.description: "There are things in this universe that we cannot control, and then there are the things we can. . . . Let fate, coincidence, and accident conspire; human beings must act on reason." -- David Guterson

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Gaston Leroux
item.description: "Erik is not truly dead. He lives on within the souls of those who choose to listen to the music of the night." -- Gaston Leroux

item.title: Pearl add a quote by David Guterson
item.description: "Accident ruled every corner of the universe except the chambers of the human heart." -- David Guterson

item.title: Pearl add a quote by David Guterson
item.description:
"The world was incomprehensibly intricate, and yet this forest made a simple sense in her heart that she felt nowhere else.
[S]he wanted only her own strawberry farm, the fragrance of the fields and the cedar trees, and to live simply in this place forever.
[S]he had fallen into loving him long before she knew herself, though it occurred to her now that she might never know herself, that perhaps no one ever does, that such a thing might not be possible.
[Y]ou should learn to say nothing that will cause you regret. You should not say what is not in your heart -- or what is only in your heart for a moment. But you know this -- silence is better." -- David Guterson

item.title: Pearl add a quote by David Guterson
item.description: "How could they say that they truly loved each other? They had simply grown up together, been children together, and the proximity of it, the closeness of it, had produced in them love s illusion. And yet--on the other hand--what was love if it wasn't this instinct she felt..." -- David Guterson

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "I'm not living with you. We occupy the same cage. (Maggie)" -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "I've got the guts to die. What I want to know is, have you got the guts to live?" -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "Why is it so damn hard for people to talk?" -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "Mendacity is a system that we live in," declares Brick. "Liquor is one way out an'death's the other." -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Ian McEwan
item.description: "This is how the entire course of a life can be changed: by doing nothing." -- Ian McEwan

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "I know I fib a good deal. After all, a woman's charm is fifty per cent illusion, but when a thing is important I tell the truth. - Blanche Scene II" -- Tennessee Williams

item.title: Pearl add a quote by Tennessee Williams
item.description: "Oh, you can't describe someone you're in love with!" -- Tennessee Williams
